# autoparallel

```{r}
library(autoparallel)
```

At the simplest level we can swap out serial R functions with equivalent
parallel ones.

```{r}
code = parse(text = "x = 1:10
    sinx = lapply(x, sin)")
pcode = data_parallel(code)
pcode
```
